tool_description: API to convert product brand name, product catalogue, grocery item name, anything related to FMCG.
name: Transliteration for FMCG  domain
title: Transliteration for FMCG  domain

api_list.name: transliteration
api_list.description: Converts the content related to FMCG  into Indian Languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://transliteration-for-fmcg-domain.p.rapidapi.com/transliteration"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transliteration-for-fmcg-domain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
